mdRecord.dcterms:title: No. 224 The Tomb of Washington., c. 1859
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: E. & H.T. Anthony (Firm)
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Published by E. & H. T. Anthony & Co., Emporium of American and Foreign Stereoscopic Vies, Chromos and Albums, 591 Broadway, opposite Metropolitan Hotel, New York.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Stereoscopic view of Washington's tomb. Two gentlemen are standing at the entrance to the vault. Wood planks have been used to create a walkway to the tomb. Mounted on yellow board. A printed label on the reverse reads: Anthony's Stereoscopic Views. No. 224, The Tomb of Washington. Published by E. & H. T. Anthony & Co., Emporium of American and Foreign Stereoscopic Vies, Chromos and Albums, 591 Broadway, opposite Metropolitan Hotel, New York.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Mount Vernon (VA : Estate)
George Washington's Mount Vernon
Tomb
